headline.print_headline: State’s Top Financial Regulator Is Leaving
headline.main: New York State’s Financial Regulator Says He Is Leaving

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and JESSE McKINLEY

snippet: Anthony J. Albanese, superintendent of the State Department of Financial Services, disputed reports he was resigning over tensions with the governor’s office.
abstract: New York State's top financial regulator Anthony J Albanese announces he will resign in internal memo to his staff at State Dept of Financial Services; denies rumors that his departure stems from disagreement with Gov Andrew M Cuomo's office; will remain in office until December.
lead_paragraph: Anthony J. Albanese, superintendent of the State Department of Financial Services, disputed reports he was resigning over tensions with the governor’s office.
